titleStmt.title: The constant lovers mortal mistake. While Phaons absence caus'd suspition strange in her who wondred that his love should change, her bloody knife a mortal blow did give her, startled hereat he fell into the river, his dream was fatal while her deep suspition caus'd these poor souls to dye in this condition. Tune of, Young Phaon.

The constant lovers mortal mistake. While Phaons absence caus'd suspition strange in her who wondred that his love should change, her bloody knife a mortal blow did give her, startled hereat he fell into the river, his dream was fatal while her deep suspition caus'd these poor souls to dye in this condition. Tune of, Young Phaon.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere. J. Wright. J. Clark. W. Thackery and T. Passenger.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Young Phaon sate upon the brink ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: T. Vere. J. Wright. J. Clark. W. Thackery
